definition: mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
GATT, the 1995 General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade
pinyin: Guan1 shui4 yu3 Mao4 yi4 Zong3 xie2 ding4

sentences.english: Tariffs redistributed wealth from the South to the North.
sentences.chinese: 关税使得财富从南方流向北方。

sentences.english: In 1767 Britain put customs duty on many goods such as tea.
sentences.chinese: 1767年，英国对许多货物征收关税，例如茶叶。

sentences.english: The benefit can be achieved through tariff reductions and early harvest.
sentences.chinese: 这种让利，比如通过减免关税，通过早期收获实现。

sentences.english: New packers will petition as respondents and attempt to secure low tariffs.
sentences.chinese: 新加壳将请愿书，应答者，为了能够保证低关税。

sentences.english: Customs duties were suspended on certain weapons and military equipment from the start of 2003.
sentences.chinese: 从2003年开始，某些武器和军事装备的关税暂停。

sentences.english: Is there import duty to ship these presses to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 向美国进口这类油压机需要进口关税吗？

sentences.english: Tariff quota concessions will be implemented according to the date specified in the "implementation" column.
sentences.chinese: 关税配额减让将按照“实施”栏中列明的日期实施。

sentences.english: Thee U. S. government imposed a high tariff on foreign products to maintain profitability.
sentences.chinese: 美国政府为了保持盈利对外国产品征收高额关税。

sentences.english: In Florida motorboats now take an increasing toll.
sentences.chinese: 在佛罗里达摩托艇现在要交纳越来越多的关税。

sentences.english: The government has raised tariff walls against foreign goods.
sentences.chinese: 政府已建立关税壁垒以抵制舶来品。

sentences.english: The steep tariffs sought in the trade complaint could also cause China to retaliate.
sentences.chinese: 贸易起诉中所要求的过高的关税也会招致中国的报复。

sentences.english: Export duties are not included in the customs value.
sentences.chinese: 出口关税不计入完税价格。

sentences.english: Overseas customers pay any taxes and duties charged by their country's Customs.
sentences.chinese: 而海外的顾客应自行付他们国家海关征收的关税。

sentences.english: The tariff on many goods is already zero tariff.
sentences.chinese: 有很多商品己经是零关税。

sentences.english: His campaign workers went to businessmen who had become rich because of high protective tariffs.
sentences.chinese: 他的竞选工作人员到谁已因高保护性关税富商。

sentences.english: It is advisable for you to apply for a GSP Form A to save the cost of import duty.
sentences.chinese: 为了节约进口关税，你们可以申请普惠制原产地证书。

definition: to import/imported/entrance/inlet (for the intake of air, water etc)
